blogs.title: Making wearable medical devices more patient-friendly with Professor Esther Rodriguez-Villegas from Acurable
blogs.author: Darrell Etherington
blogs.content: Welcome back to Found, where we get the stories behind the startups. This week, our old friend Darrell Etherington joins Becca Szkutak to talk with Professor Esther Rodriguez-Villegas from Acurable... In the rapidly evolving world of healthcare technology, wearable medical devices have emerged as pivotal tools for monitoring health and managing chronic conditions. However, their effectiveness often hinges on patient compliance and usability. Professor Esther Rodriguez-Villegas, a leading expert in this field and co-founder of Acurable, emphasizes the importance of designing wearable devices that prioritize patient comfort and accessibility.

blogs.title: Rainforest raises $8.5M to help software companies embed financial services, payments
blogs.author: Mary Ann Azevedo
blogs.content: In November 2019, Andreessen Horowitz General Partner Angela Strange famously declared that, “Every company will be a fintech company.” Specifically, Strange projected that — in the not-too-d... Rainforest, an innovative company specializing in embedded financial services, has successfully raised $8.5 million in its latest funding round. This significant investment marks a pivotal moment in the company’s mission to empower software companies to seamlessly integrate financial services and payment solutions into their platforms.

blogs.title: Pow.bio says biomanufacturing is broken and its continuous fermentation tech will fix it
blogs.author: Christine Hall
blogs.content: Pow.bio intends to bring down the costs associated with biomanufacturing by reimagining of fermentation facility operations The Challenges of Traditional Biomanufacturin biomanufacturing processes often rely on batch fermentation, which can be time-consuming and resource-intensive. This method involves producing biological products in discrete batches, leading to several issues.

blogs.title: Latest technology is a best technology. ai is one of the best growing field in world .
blogs.author: Hank bolen
blogs.content: Artificial intelligence (AI), in its broadest sense, is intelligence exhibited by machines, particularly computer systems. It is a field of research in computer science that develops and studies methods and software that enable machines to perceive their environment and use learning and intelligence to take actions that maximize their chances of achieving defined goals. Such machines may be called AIs.
